short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make your professional social network professional again

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ShadowLink hides promoted content on your LinkedIn feed (home page) and jobs listings helping you to focus your time on organic content. We all have seen an increase in promoted content on professional social networks and this extension will do its little part to keep the feed more relevant to you.

ðŸ”’ The ShadowLink extension does not collect any user data and neither makes any web/API calls in the background. Your privacy is the priority.

ðŸ“£ Please share ShadowLink with your colleagues, and friends and help spread the enhanced experience.
